snippet: Lubomir Visnovsky said he was tired of being "pushed" by the Islanders and the N.H.L. to return to North America rather than stay with Slovan Bratislava of the K.H.L.
abstract: Lubomir Visnovsky said he was tired of being "pushed" by the Islanders and the N.H.L. to return to North America rather than stay with Slovan Bratislava of the K.H.L.

headline.main: Islanders Defenseman Doesn't Want to Be Pushed Back to N.H.L.
